verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* pestilential \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5782"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* fanners, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* fan \w her|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* destroy \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* affliction.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* bendeth, \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w and|strong="H7198"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* armed \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* coat \w of|strong="H3605"\w* mail: \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w*, \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w regions|strong="H0776"\w* thereof.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Juda \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H0488"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w sin|strong="H0817"\w* against \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Flee|strong="H5127"\w* ye \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* silent upon \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w revenge|strong="H5360"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* render unto \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* hath deserved.

\w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* staggered.

\w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w is|strong="H4341"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H0894"\w* destroyed: \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w balm|strong="H6875"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w pain|strong="H4341"\w*, \w if|strong="H0194"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* she \w may|strong="H0194"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* cured \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*: \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* go \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* hath \w reached|strong="H5060"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* justices: \w Come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* let \w us|strong="H0935"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Sion \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Sharpen|strong="H1305"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w quivers|strong="H7982"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath raised \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w mind|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

\w Upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w standard|strong="H5251"\w*, \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w watch|strong="H8104"\w*: \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ambushes|strong="H0693"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w purposed|strong="H2161"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H1571"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

O thou \w that|strong="H4325"\w* dwellest \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, rich \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, thy \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thy entire destruction.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*, saying: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* thee \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w locusts|strong="H3218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* lift \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* joyful \w shout|strong="H1959"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, \w that|strong="H0776"\w* hath \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* uttereth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* multiplied \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: \w he|strong="H6213"\w* lifteth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* clouds \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w become|strong="H3001"\w* foolish \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: \w every|strong="H3605"\w* founder \w is|strong="H3605"\w* confounded \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H1847"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath cast \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w and|strong="H1892"\w* worthy \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w be|strong="H6256"\w* laughed \w at|strong="H4639"\w*, \w in|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H6256"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* visitation \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H4639"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H1931"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Israel \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

Thou dashest together \w for|strong="H3627"\w* \w me|strong="H0859"\w* \w the|strong="H7843"\w* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* thee \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* dash \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* together, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* thee \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7393"\w* \w with|strong="H7393"\w* thee \w I|strong="H7393"\w* \w will|strong="H7392"\w* break \w in|strong="H7392"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H7392"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w his|strong="H7392"\w* \w rider|strong="H7392"\w*, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w with|strong="H7393"\w* thee \w I|strong="H7393"\w* \w will|strong="H7392"\w* break \w in|strong="H7392"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H7392"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w him|strong="H7392"\w* that getteth up into \w it|strong="H7392"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* thee \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* break \w in|strong="H0376"\w* pieces \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* thee \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* break \w in|strong="H0376"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H0802"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0802"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* thee \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* break \w in|strong="H0376"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H0802"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0802"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*:

\w And|strong="H6346"\w* with thee \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w will|strong="H5739"\w* break in pieces the \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w and|strong="H6346"\w* his dock, \w and|strong="H6346"\w* with thee \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w will|strong="H5739"\w* break in pieces the husbandman \w and|strong="H6346"\w* his \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H6776"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H6346"\w* with thee \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w will|strong="H5739"\w* break in pieces \w captains|strong="H6346"\w* \w and|strong="H6346"\w* \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* render \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Sion, \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
